member.name: OPEN_PRINTER_PROPS_INFOA
member.summary: Identifies a particular property sheet in a printer's property pages and whether that property sheet should be modal. Optionally used with the function.

member.name: OPEN_PRINTER_PROPS_INFOA.pszSheetName
member.summary: The name of the property sheet. If the specified sheet is not found, the property sheet still appears with the default first page.

member.name: OPEN_PRINTER_PROPS_INFOA.uSheetIndex
member.summary: The index of the property sheet in the array of property sheets that makes up the window. If empty or invalid, the default first page is displayed.

member.name: OPEN_PRINTER_PROPS_INFOA.bModal
member.summary: TRUE if the property sheet should be modal; otherwise, FALSE.
